description: Students examine traditional and recent Christian views of conscience, as well as alternative views and criticisms from various normative perspectives. Considering philosophical theories, psychological views, feminist thought, political issues, and literary texts, students explore difficult cases of conscience. Prerequisite: completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.
name: Conscience-Critics
notes: Open only to seniors and juniors during web registration.
prerequisites: completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.

title: Conscience and Its Critics
